column1: 1.  The Accused-Appellant (hereinafter referred to as the ‘appellant’)

column2: was indicted in the High Court of Kegalle on the following counts:

column1: That  on  or  about  8th  of  July  2009,
committed the murder of one Ekanayake Mudiyanselage
Deepika  Subhashini  Dayarathne  which  is  an  offence
punishable under Section 296 of the Penal Code.
